title: Jeb Bush 2016 For President
text:
My countrymen, the hour has struck, defend your democratic rights!
Jeb Bush, the Man of the Hour

title: Jeb Bush 2016 For President
section: Jeb Bush, a Record of Success
text:
Jeb Bush, a Record of Success
Eternal Governor of Texas | Creation - The End Times
Senator of Texas | Jul. 1st 1996 - Present
Secretary of Homeland Security | Sept. 11th 2001 - Present



We will never surrender!

title: Platform
text:
No conservative litmus test for judicial appointments. (Nov 2015)
Abortion ok when LIFE of mother at risk, not just her HEALTH. (Nov 2015)
Defund Planned Parenthood, but not with federal shutdown. (Sep 2015)
I defunded Planned Parenthood in Florida; do same federally. (Sep 2015)
Husband of Terri Schiavo blames Bush for harassment. (Jan 2015)
Terri Schiavo case: ordered feeding tube reinserted. (Feb 2014)
OpEd: Jeb avoids extremism on women’s issues. (Aug 2012)
Funded adoption counseling, but not abortion counseling. (Dec 2009)
Prevent use of public funds for stem cell research. (Dec 2009)
Created divisive “Choose Life” license plates. (Feb 2007)
Parental consent; clinic regulation; pro-life counseling. (Feb 2007)
Restrict abortions to incest, rape, & health. (Jul 1998)
No need to teach about abortion if we have moral absolutes. (Nov 1995)
